definition: to spin a web (spider)/to weave a net (e.g. for fishing)
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

pinyin: ju2 bu4 lian2 jie2 wang3 luo4

definition: better to go home and weave a net than to stand by the pond longing for fish (idiom)/one should take practical steps to achieve one's aim
pinyin: lin2 yuan1 xian4 yu2 , bu4 ru2 tui4 er2 jie2 wang3
containing_words.word: 临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网

sentences.english: Why orb spiders are successful receiver exploiters ?
sentences.chinese: 为何结网性蜘蛛为成功的受讯方剥削者？

sentences.english: The spider crept up the ceiling and started to make its web.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛爬上天花板而且开始结网。

sentences.english: Spiders spin webs and birds build nests by instinct.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛结网，鸟筑巢，都是凭本能。

sentences.english: Fuxi day bashing by the mosquito spider web inspired the creation of closed networks.
sentences.chinese: 伏羲一日受蜘蛛结网扑蚊子的启示，创造了结网。

sentences.english: Fuxi day bashing by the mosquito spider web inspired the creation of closed networks.
sentences.chinese: 伏羲一日受蜘蛛结网扑蚊子的启示，创造了结网。

sentences.english: Spiders spin webs amid the jungle in order to capture insects as their food.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛在丛林间结网并以捕捉昆虫为食。

sentences.english: Pro Yuan Mu fish Than retreat webs.
sentences.chinese: 临渊慕鱼，不如退而结网。

sentences.english: A spider has to pick up a living somehow or other, and I happen to be a trapper.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛总得想办法活下去啊，碰巧我是一个结网捉虫的。

sentences.english: He watched breathlessly the spider attempt to spin its web for the third time.
sentences.chinese: 他聚精会神地看蜘蛛企图第三次结网。

sentences.english: The most important product of 'the network' is 'the networker.
sentences.chinese: “网络”的最重要产品是“结网者”。

sentences.english: Why does a spider have a web and not a house ?
sentences.chinese: 为什么蜘蛛要结网而不造房子？

sentences.english: He breathlessly watched the spider attempt to spin its web for the third time.
sentences.chinese: 他凝神屏息地观看那蜘蛛试图第三次结网。

sentences.english: Spiders spin webs amid the bush to capture insects as their food.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛在灌木丛中结网并以捕捉昆虫为食。

sentences.english: It is interesting to watch a spider making its web.
sentences.chinese: 观察蜘蛛结网是很有趣的事。

sentences.english: They use the silk to make webs.
The spider was spinning a web .

definition: (of spiders, caterpillars, silkworms etc) to extrude silk
net used to catch fish (or other animals such as birds)/(fig.) the net of justice 法網|法网[fa3 wang3]
variant of 漁網|渔网[yu2 wang3]
long-jawed orb weaver, aka long-jawed spider (family Tetragnathidae)
